main event: A youth and his friend observed erratic motions of one or more objects over a period of 1 hour and 41 minutes in Middleboro, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The objects displayed series of erratic motions,The sighting duration was nearly two hours,No photographs were taken of the sighting,The witness reported unusual flight patterns including zig-zag movements,The objects were assessed as conventional or uninterpreted due to insufficient data
sighted object: one or more unidentified flying objects
witness description: Youth aged 15 and a friend, both interested in UFOs
